org.bff.javampd.monitor

Class MPDStandAloneMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bff.javampd.monitor.MPDStandAloneMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, PlayerBasicChangeListener, StandAloneMonitor

    public class MPDStandAloneMonitor
extends Object
implements StandAloneMonitor, PlayerBasicChangeListener
    MPDStandAloneMonitor monitors a MPD connection by querying the status and statistics of the MPD server at given getDelay intervals. As statistics change appropriate events are fired indicating these changes. If more detailed events are desired attach listeners to the different controllers of a connection.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bill

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.bff.javampd.StandAloneMonitor
